class.name: social_octomap_rviz_plugin/OccupancyGrid
class.description: Displays 3D occupancy grids generated from compressed social_octomap messages.

class.name: social_octomap_rviz_plugin/ColorOccupancyGrid
class.description: Displays 3D occupancy grids generated from compressed color social_octomap messages.

class.name: social_octomap_rviz_plugin/OccupancyGridStamped
class.description: Displays 3D occupancy grids generated from compressed social_octomap messages.

class.name: social_octomap_rviz_plugin/OccupancyMap
class.description: Displays projected 2D occupancy maps generated from compressed social_octomap messages.

class.name: social_octomap_rviz_plugin/OccupancyMapStamped
class.description: Displays projected 2D occupancy maps generated from compressed social_octomap messages.
